TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 367
TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F Austin to Texas Gazette, 04-10-1830

barker_notes.barker_summary: Editorial by Austin in Texas Gazette, April 10, 1830. Discussing reciprocal benefits of liberal colonization policy to Mexico and the immigrants.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 367

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Editorial by Austin in Texas Gazette, April 10, 1830. Discussing reciprocal benefits of liberal colonization policy to Mexico and the immigrants.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*[Texas Gazette, April 10, 1830. Lauding the generous immigration policy of Mexico. Omitted.]*/p*
*/div1*
